verses.verse: And, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> there <S%H935>came<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> out of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> by the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to <S%H1008>Bethel:<s%> and <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> by the <S%H4196>altar<s%> to <S%H6999>burn<s%> <S%H6999>incense.<s%>

And he <S%H7121>cried<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> in the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> O <S%H4196>altar,<s%> <S%H4196>altar,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> a <S%H1121>child<s%> shall be <S%H3205>born<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> by <S%H8034>name;<s%> and on you shall he <S%H2076>offer<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> of the <S%H1116>high<s%> places that <S%H6999>burn<s%> <S%H6999>incense<s%> on you, and <S%H120>men's<s%> <S%H6106>bones<s%> shall be <S%H8313>burnt<s%> on you.

And he <S%H5414>gave<s%> a <S%H4159>sign<s%> the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> is the <S%H4159>sign<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken;<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> shall be <S%H7167>rent,<s%> and the <S%H1880>ashes<s%> that are on it shall be <S%H8210>poured<s%> out.

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, when <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H1697>saying<s%> of the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> had <S%H7121>cried<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> in <S%H1008>Bethel,<s%> that he <S%H7971>put<s%> <S%H7971>forth<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> from the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Lay <S%H8610>hold<s%> on him. And his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H7971>put<s%> <S%H7971>forth<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> him, <S%H3001>dried<s%> up, so that he <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H7725>pull<s%> it in <S%H7725>again<s%> to him.

The <S%H4196>altar<s%> also was <S%H7167>rent,<s%> and the <S%H1880>ashes<s%> <S%H8210>poured<s%> out from the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> according to the <S%H4159>sign<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H5414>given<s%> by the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H2470>Entreat<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H6419>pray<s%> for me, that my <S%H3027>hand<s%> may be <S%H7725>restored<s%> me <S%H7725>again.<s%> And the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2470>sought<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> was <S%H7725>restored<s%> him <S%H7725>again,<s%> and <S%H1961>became<s%> as it was <S%H7223>before.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1696>said<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H935>Come<s%> <S%H1004>home<s%> with me, and <S%H5582>refresh<s%> yourself, and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you a <S%H4991>reward.<s%>

And the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> you will <S%H5414>give<s%> me <S%H2677>half<s%> your <S%H1004>house,<s%> I will not <S%H935>go<s%> in with you, <S%H3808>neither<s%> will I <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place:<s%>

For <S%H3651>so<s%> was it <S%H6680>charged<s%> me by the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H398>Eat<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3899>bread,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> by the same <S%H1870>way<s%> that you <S%H1980>came.<s%>
So he <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H1870>way,<s%> and <S%H7725>returned<s%> not by the <S%H1870>way<s%> that he <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1008>Bethel.<s%>

Now there <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> an <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H5030>prophet<s%> in <S%H1008>Bethel;<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H5608>told<s%> him <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4639>works<s%> that the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H6213>done<s%> that <S%H3117>day<s%> in <S%H1008>Bethel:<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> them they <S%H5608>told<s%> also to their <S%H1>father.<s%>

And their <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H1696>said<s%> to them, <S%H335>What<s%> <S%H2088><s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> he? For his <S%H1121>sons<s%> had <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1980>went,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> from <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>
And he <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H2280>Saddle<s%> me the <S%H2543>ass.<s%> So they <S%H2280>saddled<s%> him the <S%H2543>ass:<s%> and he <S%H7392>rode<s%> <S%H5921>thereon,<s%>

And <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H4672>found<s%> him <S%H3427>sitting<s%> <S%H413>under<s%> <S%H478><s%> an <S%H424>oak:<s%> and he <S%H559>said<s%> to him, Are you the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> that <S%H935>came<s%> from <S%H3063>Judah?<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> I am.
Then he <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H3212>Come<s%> <S%H1004>home<s%> with me, and <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> I <S%H3201>may<s%> not <S%H7725>return<s%> with you, nor <S%H935>go<s%> in with you: <S%H3808>neither<s%> will I <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> with you in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place:<s%>

For it was <S%H1697>said<s%> to me by the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> You shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> to <S%H3212>go<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> that you <S%H1980>came.<s%>

He <S%H559>said<s%> to him, I am a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> as you are; and an <S%H4397>angel<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to me by the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H7725>Bring<s%> him <S%H7725>back<s%> with you <S%H413>into<s%> your <S%H1004>house,<s%> that he may <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water.<s%> But he <S%H3584>lied<s%> to him.
So he <S%H7725>went<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> with him, and did <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> in his <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H8354>drank<s%> <S%H4325>water.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, as they <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H413>at<s%> the <S%H7979>table,<s%> that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> that <S%H7725>brought<s%> him <S%H7725>back:<s%>

And he <S%H7121>cried<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> that <S%H935>came<s%> from <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> For as <S%H3282>much<s%> <S%H834><s%> as you have <S%H4784>disobeyed<s%> the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and have not <S%H8104>kept<s%> the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you,

But <S%H7725>came<s%> <S%H7725>back,<s%> and have <S%H398>eaten<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H8354>drunk<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> in the <S%H4725>place,<s%> of the <S%H834>which<s%> the Lord did <S%H1696>say<s%> to you, <S%H398>Eat<s%> <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H3899>bread,<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H4325>water;<s%> your <S%H5038>carcass<s%> shall not <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H6913>sepulcher<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, <S%H310>after<s%> he had <S%H398>eaten<s%> <S%H3899>bread,<s%> and <S%H310>after<s%> he had <S%H8354>drunk,<s%> that he <S%H2280>saddled<s%> for him the <S%H2543>ass,<s%> to wit, for the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> he had <S%H7725>brought<s%> <S%H7725>back.<s%>

And when he was <S%H3212>gone,<s%> a <S%H738>lion<s%> <S%H4672>met<s%> him by the <S%H1870>way,<s%> and <S%H4191>slew<s%> him: and his <S%H5038>carcass<s%> was <S%H7993>cast<s%> in the <S%H1870>way,<s%> and the <S%H2543>ass<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> by it, the <S%H738>lion<s%> also <S%H5975>stood<s%> by the <S%H5038>carcass.<s%>

And, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> by, and <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H5038>carcass<s%> <S%H7993>cast<s%> in the <S%H1870>way,<s%> and the <S%H738>lion<s%> <S%H5975>standing<s%> by the <S%H5038>carcass:<s%> and they <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H1696>told<s%> it in the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> the <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H3427>dwelled.<s%>

And when the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> that <S%H7725>brought<s%> him <S%H7725>back<s%> from the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> thereof, he <S%H559>said,<s%> It is the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> was <S%H4784>disobedient<s%> to the <S%H6310>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> therefore the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H5414>delivered<s%> him to the <S%H738>lion,<s%> which has <S%H7665>torn<s%> him, and <S%H4191>slain<s%> him, according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to him.
And he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2280>Saddle<s%> me the <S%H2543>ass.<s%> And they <S%H2280>saddled<s%> him.

And he <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H4672>found<s%> his <S%H5038>carcass<s%> <S%H7993>cast<s%> in the <S%H1870>way,<s%> and the <S%H2543>ass<s%> and the <S%H738>lion<s%> <S%H5975>standing<s%> by the <S%H5038>carcass:<s%> the <S%H738>lion<s%> had not <S%H398>eaten<s%> the <S%H5038>carcass,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H7665>torn<s%> the <S%H2543>ass.<s%>

And the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H5375>took<s%> up the <S%H5038>carcass<s%> of the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H3240>laid<s%> it on the <S%H2543>ass,<s%> and <S%H7725>brought<s%> it <S%H7725>back:<s%> and the <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H5892>city,<s%> to <S%H5594>mourn<s%> and to <S%H6912>bury<s%> him.
And he <S%H3240>laid<s%> his <S%H5038>carcass<s%> in his own <S%H6913>grave;<s%> and they <S%H5594>mourned<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> him, saying, <S%H1945>Alas,<s%> my <S%H251>brother!<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, <S%H310>after<s%> he had <S%H6912>buried<s%> him, that he <S%H559>spoke<s%> to his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> When I am <S%H4191>dead,<s%> then <S%H6912>bury<s%> me in the <S%H6913>sepulcher<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H6912>buried;<s%> <S%H3240>lay<s%> my <S%H6106>bones<s%> <S%H681>beside<s%> his <S%H6106>bones:<s%>

For the <S%H1697>saying<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H7121>cried<s%> by the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> in <S%H1008>Bethel,<s%> and <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of the <S%H1116>high<s%> places <S%H834>which<s%> are in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria,<s%> shall <S%H3588>surely<s%> <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass.

<S%H310>After<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> not from his <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1870>way,<s%> but <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> of the <S%H7098>lowest<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3548>priests<s%> of the <S%H1116>high<s%> places: whoever <S%H2655>would,<s%> he <S%H3027>consecrated<s%> him, and he <S%H1961>became<s%> one of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> of the <S%H1116>high<s%> places.

And <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H1961>became<s%> <S%H2403>sin<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam,<s%> even to <S%H3582>cut<s%> it off, and to <S%H8045>destroy<s%> it from off the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>earth.<s%>
